nodes.documentation:
@dev Run the template with
      ```
      solc-select use 0.5.0
      echidna ./src/Template.sol --contract TestToken --test-mode assertion
      ```
      or by providing a config
      ```
      echidna ./src/Template.sol --contract TestToken --config ./config.yaml
      ```
nodes.name: TestToken

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Ownable: Caller is not the owner."

arguments.value: Ownable: Caller is not the owner.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Ownable: Caller is not the owner."

devdoc.details: Run the template with      ```      solc-select use 0.5.0      echidna ./src/Template.sol --contract TestToken --test-mode assertion      ```      or by providing a config      ```      echidna ./src/Template.sol --contract TestToken --config ./config.yaml      ```
